title: Kindermalke
description: Kindermalke is an interactive story (like a text-based video game) about a young girl named Ofra who lives with her cruel stepfather in an isolated mansion in the middle of a forest. Drawn into a dreamlike and mysterious world of fairies and monsters, Ofra discovers that she's the lost queen of a magical kingdom. She must harness all her bravery if she wishes to ascend to her rightful place.
author: Kayla Bashe
